column5: CHINESE SICK LEAVE : 'I NO COME WORK TODAY!!!'  Hung Chow calls into work and says, 'Hey, I no come work today, I really sick . Got headache, stomach ache and legs hurt, I no come work.'  The boss says, 'You know something, Hung Chow, I really need you today. When I feel sick like you do, I go to my wife and tell her to give me sex. That makes everything better and I go to work.. You try that.'  Two hours later Hung Chow calls again. 'I do what you say and I feel great. I be at work soon.........You got nice house'
What a way tos start the day
I just forward that to a few people at work..  Thanks for the chuckle.  I needed that this morning.
Good one   I wonder if he took a dump by the bosses propane tanks too  :jerry:
At least it was Hung Chow and not Hung Low...
